dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 410 RH: Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Extension Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Begich introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To extend the Alaska Native Vietnam era veterans land allotment program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Extension Act of 2025.

section.header: Extension of the Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Program
section.text: Section 1119(b)(3)(B) of the John D. Dingell, Jr. Conservation, Management, and Recreation Act (43 U.S.C. 1629g–1(b)(3)(B)) is amended by striking 5-year period and inserting 10-year period.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
